mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_id AS reservationId, r.reserver_name AS reserverName, r.reserver_phone AS reserverPhone, a.accommodations_name AS accommodationName, r.checkin AS checkin, r.checkout AS checkout, r.guest_count AS guestCount, r.final_payment_amount AS finalPaymentAmount, r.reservation_status AS reservationStatus FROM reservation r JOIN accommodation a ON a.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id WHERE a.user_id = #{hostId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

SELECT r.reservation_id AS reservationId, r.reserver_name AS reserverName, r.reserver_phone AS reserverPhone, a.accommodations_name AS accommodationName, r.checkin AS checkin, r.checkout AS checkout, r.guest_count AS guestCount, r.final_payment_amount AS finalPaymentAmount, r.reservation_status AS reservationStatus FROM reservation r JOIN accommodation a ON a.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id WHERE a.user_id = #{hostId} AND r.checkin < #{end} AND r.checkout >= #{start} ORDER BY r.checkin ASC, r.checkout ASC

SELECT r.reservation_id AS reservationId, r.reserver_name AS reserverName, r.reserver_phone AS reserverPhone, a.accommodations_name AS accommodationName, r.checkin AS checkin, r.checkout AS checkout, r.guest_count AS guestCount, r.final_payment_amount AS finalPaymentAmount, r.reservation_status AS reservationStatus FROM reservation r JOIN accommodation a ON a.accommodations_id = r.accommodations_id WHERE a.user_id = #{hostId} AND r.reservation_id = #{reservationId}
